Expected Result: System allows successful renter registration with valid inputs (name email password phone address).
System allows successful owner registration with ID document upload and store details.
System should not allow duplicate account registration and display error message.
Users login with valid credentials and are redirected to appropriate dashboard based on role.
System displays error and denies access for invalid credentials.
User receives verification email and can verify account via link before login.
User can request a new verification email if original is lost or expired.
User receives password reset email with reset link.
System should reset password successfully with valid token or reject expired tokens.
New profile data (name phone address photo) should be saved and reflected immediately.
Password should be changed successfully with old password verification.
User is logged out and redirected to the login screen.
6-digit OTP code is generated and sent via SMS to user's phone number.
OTP verification succeeds with correct code within 10 minutes or fails with incorrect/expired code or after 5 failed attempts.
User can request a new OTP code which invalidates previous unverified codes.
Phone numbers are correctly formatted to international format (63XXXXXXXXX).
System accepts valid ID documents (JPG PNG) and extracts information via OCR.

Unit Test: ID Document OCR and Field Extraction
Expected Result: Google Cloud Vision API extracts text and system extracts name address DOB and ID number from OCR text.
System validates that ID document contains required fields (Name/Pangalan) and rejects invalid documents.

Unit Test: Reject Invalid or Unsupported File Format
Expected Result: System rejects ID documents that do not contain valid ID information or are not JPG JPEG or PNG format.
System validates address using OpenStreetMap Nominatim API returns coordinates and autocomplete suggests valid addresses.
Owner can add bike with details (brand model price photos) and it appears in their listings.
Owner can modify bike details and changes are saved and reflected.
System shows available bikes with search and filter options (location brand price).
Booking is created with selected dates and bike reserved in the system with correct schedule.
System should prevent booking if bike is already reserved for those dates.
Owner can approve or reject booking request and renter is notified.
Payment is processed securely and booking is confirmed upon successful payment.
Booking is created with cash payment status and requires owner verification.
Owner can verify cash payment and activate booking rental time starts.
Renter's location is tracked and sent to owner in real-time every 15 seconds.
Owner can see renter's live location on map with bike icon marker and geofence circle.
Owner receives in-app notification and renter receives SMS alert when renter leaves geofence boundary.
User receives notification via SignalR and it appears as popup at top of page.
Badge count updates automatically and sound plays when notification is received.
